import {Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; import {Player} from "../../interfaces/Player"; @Component({ selector: 'app-player-box', templateUrl: './player-box.component.html', styleUrls: ['./player-box.component.css'], }) export class PlayerBoxComponent { @Input() player: Player; progress: number = 50; @Input() gameHasStarted: boolean; dataSource: GameStats[]; }
